name: Untitled Maze Escape Game
description:
Idea

'make a game with what i made' hmm? i like stealth games... sci-fi games are cool... how about stealth/sci-fi game? actually the idea for the game is very much different to what i intended, the "stealth" element remians the same but the original idea was to escape your killer clones. the sci-fi part came about when i was trying to see what else would fit and started rhyming clones... yer i just landed on drones and rolled with it :P

How to play?

you must escape the maze by locating the blue door, there will be drones standing in your path, you must avoid them.
